title: Deep & Cross Network (Building recommendation systems with TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this video, we are going to extend our discussion on Building recommendation systems with TensorFlow to Deep & Cross Network.  Deep cross network using TensorFlow Recommenders → https://goo.gle/37if0T0  DCN V1: Deep & Cross Network for Ad Click Predictions → https://goo.gle/3ftTuiJ  DCN V2: Improved
